import React from 'react' import {initialCards, profileEditButton, profileButton, nameInput, jobInput, config, avatarButton} from '../utils/constants.js' function Main(){ function handleEditAvatarClick(){ const avatarPopup = document.querySelector('.popup_type_profile-avatar'); avatarPopup.classList.add('popup_active') }; function handleEditProfileClick(){ const profilePopup = document.querySelector('.popup_type_profile'); profilePopup.classList.add('popup_active') }; function handleAppPlaceClick(){ const cardPopup = document.querySelector('.popup_type_create-card'); cardPopup.classList.add('popup_active') }; avatarButton.addEventListener('click', handleEditAvatarClick); profileEditButton.addEventListener('click', function(){ handleEditProfileClick() }); profileButton.addEventListener('click', function(){ handleAppPlaceClick() }); return (
